verses.verse: Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> my rock,<WH6697> who teaches<WH3925> my hands<WH3027> to war,<WH7128> and my fingers<WH676> to battle:<WH4421>
my loving kindness,<WH2617> my fortress,<WH4686> my high tower,<WH4869> my deliverer,<WH6403> my shield,<WH4043> and he in whom I take refuge;<WH2620> who subdues<WH7286> my people under me.<WH5971>
Yahweh,<WH3068> what is man,<WH120> that you care<WH3045> for him?<WH1121> Or the son of man,<WH582> that you think of him?<WH2803>
Man<WH120> is like<WH1819> a breath.<WH1892> His days<WH3117> are like a shadow<WH6738> that passes away.<WH5674>
Part<WH5186> your heavens,<WH8064> Yahweh,<WH3068> and come down.<WH3381> Touch<WH5060> the mountains,<WH2022> and they will smoke.<WH6225>
Throw out<WH1299> lightning,<WH1300> and scatter<WH6327> them.<WH7971> Send out your arrows,<WH2671> and rout them.<WH2000>
Stretch<WH7971> out your hand<WH3027> from above,<WH4791> rescue<WH5337> me,<WH5337> and deliver me out of great<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> out of the hands<WH3027> of<WH5236> foreigners;<WH1121>
whose mouths<WH6310> speak<WH1696> deceit,<WH7723> Whose right hand<WH3225> is a right hand<WH3225> of falsehood.<WH8267>
I will sing<WH7891> a new<WH2319> song<WH7892> to you,<WH430> God. On a ten-stringed<WH6218> lyre,<WH5035> I will sing praises to you.<WH2167>
You are he who gives<WH5414> salvation<WH8668> to kings,<WH4428> who rescues<WH6475> David,<WH1732> his servant,<WH5650> from the deadly<WH7451> sword.<WH2719>

Rescue<WH6475> me,<WH5337> and deliver me out of the hands<WH3027> of<WH5236> foreigners,<WH1121> whose mouths<WH6310> speak<WH1696> deceit,<WH7723> whose right hand<WH3225> is a right hand<WH3225> of falsehood.<WH8267>
Then our sons<WH1121> will be like well-nurtured<WH1431> plants,<WH5195> <WH5271> our daughters<WH1323> like pillars<WH2106> carved<WH2404> to adorn<WH8403> a palace.<WH1964>
Our barns<WH4200> are full,<WH4392> filled with all kinds<WH6329> of provision.<WH2177> Our sheep<WH6629> bring forth thousands<WH503> and ten thousands<WH503> in our fields.<WH2351>
Our oxen<WH441> will pull heavy loads.<WH5445> There is no breaking in,<WH6556> and no going away,<WH3318> and no outcry<WH6682> in our streets.<WH7339>
Happy<WH835> are the people<WH5971> who are in such a situation.<WH3602> Happy<WH835> are the people<WH5971> whose God<WH430> is Yahweh.<WH3068>
